name: Noodles
description:
Made for the 1-Bit Weekend Jam!  This game has the Dragons theme!

Noodles the Dragon needs to defend the Orbs of Power from the aliens!  Luckily, his body is long and invincible!  He will follow your mouse, so guide him around the screen to play!

Use his body to destroy the aliens!  Eat noodles to grow longer!  But protect Noodles head from attacks, or he will shrink in length!

Game ends if the orbs are all stolen from the screen.  You gain points both for destroying aliens and for each orb that is active.  So keep them all active to keep your score growing!

Credits:

Game designed by Gawain, who also did all the graphics.  Music was made using Rytmik Ultimate.  Sounds created using BFXR and some heavy editing in Audacity.  And of course Unity 3D engine was used to bring it all together.  Thanks for playing!
